info.title: BananaStudio API Hub
info.description: Unified API Hub integrating Comet API (LLM models) and FAL Platform (creative models). Rolled back to OpenAPI 3.0.3 for Apidog UI compatibility.

tags.name: FAL_API
tags.description: FAL Platform - creative model & pricing endpoints

get.description: Retrieve list of available LLM models from Comet API gateway (e.g. GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Llama).

200.description: Successfully retrieved Comet LLM model list

get.description: Returns the complete list of available FAL Platform models (approx 866 models) from the gateway.

200.description: Successfully retrieved FAL creative model list

metadata.description: Balanced quality and speed image generation

get.description: Retrieve pricing information for FAL Platform models including unit prices and billing units.

post.description: Calculate estimated cost for FAL Platform model usage based on expected quantities.

get.description: Retrieve historical usage statistics for FAL Platform models including request counts and costs.
Retrieve aggregated analytics including performance metrics, success rates, and trends for FAL Platform models.
Returns service health status and current server timestamp.

info.title: BananaStudio API Hub
info.description: Unified API Hub integrating Comet API (LLM models) and FAL Platform (creative models) for AI-powered workflows. Rolled back to OpenAPI 3.0.3 for Apidog UI compatibility.

tags.name: FAL_API
tags.description: FAL Platform - creative model & pricing endpoints

prices.description: Retrieve list of available LLM models from Comet API gateway (e.g. GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Llama).

post.description: Calculate estimated cost for FAL Platform model usage based on expected quantity. Useful for budgeting and cost optimization.

/fal/models.description: Returns the complete list of available FAL Platform models (approx 866 models) from the gateway.

parameters.description: Start date for usage period (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

servers.name: end_date
servers.description: End date for usage period (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description: Retrieve aggregated analytics including performance metrics, success rates, and trends for FAL Platform models

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include

supported_endpoint_types.description: Types of endpoints this model supports

CometModelsResponse.description: Response format for Comet API model listing

FalModelsResponse.description: Response format for FAL Platform model listing

endpoints.description: Map of endpoint IDs to quantities

FalUsageRecord.description: FAL Platform usage record for a specific date

FalAnalyticsRecord.description: FAL Platform analytics record for a model

UnifiedModelRecord.description: Unified model record for cross-provider aggregation

BadRequest.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters

NotFound.description: Not Found - Resource does not exist

error.message: The requested resource was not found

CometAuth.name: Authorization
CometAuth.description: Comet API authentication using 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' format. Obtain your API key from the Comet dashboard at https://cometapi.com

FalAuth.name: Authorization
FalAuth.description: FAL Platform authentication using 'Key YOUR_API_KEY' format. Get your API key from FAL Platform dashboard at https://fal.ai/dashboard
